Package kalaha

Class GameState

  • java.lang.Object
    • kalaha.GameState
  • public class GameState
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a game state in the Kalaha board game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int END_N
      End index for player 2's (north's) ambos.
      static int END_S
      End index for player 1's (south's) ambos.
      static int HOUSE_N
      Index for player 2's (north's) house.
      static int HOUSE_S
      Index for player 1's (south's) house.
      static int NEXT_PLAYER
      Index for next player value in board string.
      static int START_N
      Start index for player 2's (north's) ambos.
      static int START_S
      Start index for player 1's (south's) ambos.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameState()
      Creates a start game state for a new Kalaha game.
      GameState​(int[] board, int nextPlayer)
      Creates a game state from a board representation.
      GameState​(java.lang.String boardStr)
      Creates a game state from a string board representation received from the game server.

        nextPlayer - Next player to make a move

    • Method Detail

      • clone

        public GameState clone()
        Creates a copy of this GameState object.
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The copy

      • makeMove

        public boolean makeMove​(int ambo)
        Makes a move in the current Kalaha game state.
        Parameters:
        ambo - The move to make (1-6)
        Returns:
        True if the move was successful, false if not.

      • getNextPlayer

        public int getNextPlayer()
        Returns the next player to make a move.
        Returns:
        Next player to make a move (1 or 2)

      • getSeeds

        public int getSeeds​(int ambo,
                    int player)
        Returns the number of seeds for the specified ambo and player.
        Parameters:
        ambo - The ambo (1-6)
        player - The player (1-2)
        Returns:
        Number of seeds, or -1 if an error occured

      • gameEnded

        public boolean gameEnded()
        Checks if the Kalaha game has ended. The game ends when one of the players has 0 seeds in all own ambos.
        Returns:
        True if the game has ended, false if not.

      • getWinner

        public int getWinner()
        Returns the winner for this Kalaha game.
        Returns:
        Winner (1 or 2), 0 if draw, and -1 if game is still running.

      • getNoValidMoves

        public int getNoValidMoves​(int player)
        Returns the number of possible valid moves (non-empty ambos) for the specified player in this game state.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check
        Returns:
        Number of possible moves for this player

      • moveIsPossible

        public boolean moveIsPossible​(int ambo)
        Checks if a move is possible.
        Parameters:
        ambo - The move to make (1-6)
        Returns:
        True if the move is possible (at least one seed in the ambo), false otherwise

      • getScore

        public int getScore​(int player)
        Returns the score (number of seeds in the house) for a player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player
        Returns:
        The score for the specified player

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a board string representation for this game state.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Board string representation
